body_content.explanation: a plan for how something will happen:
examples: They'd made all the arrangements for the party.
Arrangements were made to move the prisoners to another jail.
What are your current childcare arrangements?

body_content.explanation: an agreement between two people or groups about how something happens or will happen:
examples: I'm sure we can come to an arrangement (= reach an agreement).
We had an arrangement - he would clean the house and I would cook.
You can only withdraw money from this account by prior arrangement (= after making plans to do so) with the bank.

body_content.explanation: a group of objects that have been put in a particular order or position:
examples: There was a striking arrangement of dried flowers on the table.

body_content.explanation: a piece of music that has had changes made to it so that it can be played in a different way, especially by different instruments:
examples: This new arrangement of the piece is for saxophone and piano.
